re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.external

Class ExternalLaunchProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.external.ExternalLaunchProfile

  • public class ExternalLaunchProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    The External Launch Profile

    Contains the informations about an external launching.

    Since:
    3.0.0-BETA
    Version:
    3.0.2-BETA
    Author:
    Litarvan

      • ExternalLaunchProfile

        public ExternalLaunchProfile(java.lang.String mainClass,
                             java.lang.String classPath,

                             boolean redirectErrorStream,
                             java.lang.String macDockName,
                             java.io.File directory)
        Full launch profile
        Parameters:
        mainClass - Your program main class
        classPath - The classpath (you can create it using the ClasspathConstructor) It contains the path to your dependencies and your main jar
        vmArgs - The VM arguments (optional)
        args - Your program arguments (optional)
        redirectErrorStream - If the error stream need to be redirected
        macDockName - The name in the mac dock
        directory - The directory where the process need to be launched
